channel.title: [HELP] 317 PI adding nex
channel.description:
ok so i added everything but when i spawn nex she, he, it idk.. is invisible
so im guessing i gotta go into datmaker and make priority... but when i go over the nex file on dat make i get a error and when i close out of the error it keeps coming back.. and solutions? please help

item.title: [HELP] 317 PI adding nex
item.dc:creator: @sbain9395 sbain9395
item.description:
@sbain9395 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:549575”]Again, CLIENT SIDED. Not server.

Your issue is your client didn’t load the model and so when reading the values you put in your EntityDef, it has no model to base the npc off of, so it’s invisible.[/quote]

Are you able to help me on skype? please if so

SKYPENAME: Worthyman3

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] 317 PI adding nex
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Again, CLIENT SIDED. Not server.

Your issue is your client didn’t load the model and so when reading the values you put in your EntityDef, it has no model to base the npc off of, so it’s invisible.

Read full topic
